emerging_tracks.name: Design
emerging_tracks.description: Hackers explored the fundamentals of user interface/user experience (UI/UX) design from user research to beautiful mockups and prototypes.

emerging_tracks.name: Data Science
emerging_tracks.description: Hackers were exposed to the process of collecting, cleaning, and analyzing large sets of data.

emerging_tracks.name: Systems
emerging_tracks.description: Hackers delved into the basics of systems development, from circuitry to embedded systems.

emerging_tracks.name: App & Web Development
emerging_tracks.description: Hackers learned about various frameworks, from React to Flutter, they could use to create the application of their dreams.
